name: The Impossible Cave!
description:
The unforgivable, the unforgettable, the almost impossible cave!

Charter and memorise the twists and turns of the sinister cave, your next step could be your last! 

Use WASD or the arrow keys to navigate through the game until you give up or reach the end but the more you uncover, the easier it becomes :D

A game I made in a few hours as a way of learning how to use Bitsy.
